title: (x) "Kona" handwritten script - Divine, (similar to) Felt Tip Roman {Mike Y}
content:
I dunno if these 2 are the same font since they are diff cases.

Can anyone identify the font or fonts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/handwrittenfont_4999.gif)
author: shoegaze

comments.content:
The upper case font is [Divine](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403191936/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/divine/) from T-26. The lower case lettering is quite similar to Mark Simonson’s [Felt Tip Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403191936/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/felt-tip-roman/), but not identical. Brian Willson’s [Oak Street](http://web.archive.org/web/20070403191936/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/3ip/oak-street/) also has a very similar feel.

Those were the closest I found in the Script Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega
